amendment.description: Amendment requires creditors to post their credit card written agreements on their websites and requires the Federal Reserve Board to compile and report those agreements on its website.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in House Report 111-92 to require creditors to post their credit card written agreements on their websites, and requires the Board to compile and report those agreements on its website.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schauer amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
